amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to All
amendatorysection.para: The governing body of any city or village, authorized by section 18-1501 to acquire an aviation field, shall have power to lease or dispose of the same or any portion thereof when the public need will not thereby be injured.

annotation.para: Municipality may lease an airport or other air navigation facility. Brasier v. Cribbett, 166 Neb. 145, 88 N.W.2d 235 (1958).
